html:
ear was not opened. Even though the Lord has demonstrated his foreknowledge, and even though he is speaking to members of his Church, they are unwilling to hear and obey his word (Jer. 7:24-26).

deal very treacherously. This phrase characterizes Church members who will be betrayers.

transgressor from the womb. This phrase describes Church members who will be known as sinners from the very beginning.
